I extended one of the examples on Junit wesite tonight. If someone

-- dv

Usage:

public class someTest {
public static void main(String[] args) {
JUnitStart.swingUI();
// or JUnitStart.awtUI();
}
}

Source code:

package com.javamentor;

import java.io.*;

public class JUnitStart {
private JUnitStart() {
super();
}
static public final void awtUI() {
new junit.awtui.TestRunner().start(new String[] {
findThisClassName()});
}
static public final void swingUI() {
new junit.swingui.TestRunner().start(new String[] {
findThisClassName()});
}

static private final String findThisClassName() {
ByteArrayOutputStream byteStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream
(200);
try {
throw new Exception("need stack trace");
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace(new PrintStream(byteStream));
}
BufferedReader reader =
new BufferedReader(new StringReader(byteStream.toString
()));
try {
while (true) {
String line = reader.readLine();
if (line == null)
break;
int startIndex = "void".length() + 1;
int endIndex = line.indexOf(".main(");
if (endIndex != -1) {
return line.substring(startIndex, endIndex).trim
();
}

}
} catch (Exception e) {
throw new RuntimeException(e.getMessage());
}
throw new RuntimeException("could not determine Class name");
}
}
